title: koDukkak-kaNNan irukka kUDa rAdhai
sahitya:
koDukkak-kaNNan irukka kUDa rAdhai irukka kurai tAnE kANOmaDi 
kuvalayadaLam shirandiDu kaNgaL kurukurutta karuNaiyilE Uri
tavamighutta puNNiyap-phalandena daNDAmaraip-padangaLinAl vAri


anupallavi

  paDattai viritta kALiyan mEl naTamATTam paghal shenrAl iravinilE gOpiyar ATTam 
kuDattil irunda veNNai mEl kaNNOTTam kUvinAl ODi nirppAn onrum ariyAdavanATTam
kurai pOgha vazhi maNanda maraiyO muraiyOdiDa vEdAnta muDivinil oruvanAghat-tiriginravan 
tanjamana vandArkkut-tanaiyE taruginravan agham uNarnda tavattoDum ninru AnandamellAmum 
tAnE tAn enru pEshina pEccukkum pADina pATTukkum piLLattanamAgha kaLLamiTTuk-koNDu


caraNam    ettanai tAn kETpaduvO varam ettaittAn kETpaduvO
   caraNam 1    shankai illAdapaDi mangaik-karam piDittu gangaip-punaleDuttu angam teLittadu pOl
    caraNam 2    tukkANi kASukkoru mukkANi nanjai vAngi dikkAlukkoru kAval mikkAghi viTTadu pOl
    caraNam 3    kailAsam munnam vandu tailAyam vAramuDi kailAsam eNNiyoru poi lAbhamAnadu pOL
    caraNam 4    nArAyaNam kaNNukku nErAgha vandirukka rAmAyaNam tEDi pArAyaNattdu pOl
    caraNam 5    Ayiram pon koDuttu Anai onru vAngiviTTu attai kaTTum sangilikku pittam piDittadu pOlE
    caraNam 6    paTraruttu viTTEn enru shuTrattilE sholli viTTu muTrattu kAyum nellukku muraiyum iTTadu pOlE
    caraNam 7    nADALumenru sholli tEDA padavi vandum IDAna poruLukku vIDAna shonnadu pOl
ettatittAn kETpaduvO vAi tirandu ettaittAn kETpaduvO muttu nighar pallazhagil
mOnamiDum punnakaiyil cittamellAm pOnadAccE O tOzhi
